description:
The JMS connector provides sink and source capabilities to transfer messages between JMS server and Kafka brokers.
Adapter provides rich message conversion possibilities and has been tested with several widely used JMS implementations (e.g. Apache ActiveMQ, IBM MQ, Tibco EMS, Rabbit MQ, Solace PubSub).
name: kafka-connect-jms

support.summary: Company full supports this connector, alongside community members who contribute to it as an open-source project.

title: Kafka Connect JMS
